name: searchpets
description: A search engine to find your favorite Housepets comic!

scripts.dev: concurrently -n next,python "npm run dev:next" "npm run server"
scripts.start: concurrently -n next,python "npm run start:next" "npm run server"
scripts.build: yarn --cwd ./app lint && concurrently --kill-others -n next,python "yarn --cwd ./app build" "yarn server"
